00022         const Vector &x, const Vector &y, const Vector &z);

00024 COREDLL void UniformSampleDisk(float u1, float u2, float *x, float *y);
00025 inline Vector CosineSampleHemisphere(float u1, float u2) {
00026         Vector ret;
00027         ConcentricSampleDisk(u1, u2, &ret.x, &ret.y);
00028         ret.z = sqrtf(max(0.f,
00029                           1.f - ret.x*ret.x - ret.y*ret.y));
00030         return ret;
00031 }
00032 inline float CosineHemispherePdf(float costheta, float phi) {
00033         return costheta * INV_PI;
00034 }
00035 extern COREDLL Vector SampleHG(const Vector &w, float g, float u1, float u2);
00036 extern COREDLL float HGPdf(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp, float g);
00037 // MC Inline Functions
00038 inline float BalanceHeuristic(int nf, float fPdf, int ng,
00039                 float gPdf) {
00040         return (nf * fPdf) / (nf * fPdf + ng * gPdf);
00041 }
00042 inline float PowerHeuristic(int nf, float fPdf, int ng,
00043                 float gPdf) {
00044         float f = nf * fPdf, g = ng * gPdf;
00045         return (f*f) / (f*f + g*g);
00046 }
